title: He Killed Me First
description: Meet Roxy,After years of abuse at the hands of her husband, she has completely lost her mind. Sadly though, her insanity may be the only escape from her nightmarish marriage.Will Roxy save herself before it's too late, or will she find her freedom through a hole in the ground?Find out what happens when a woman is fed up to the top of her skull with the mistreatment, the cheating and the beatings.Revenge is a cold dish served with a side of gore in this cautionary tale of domestic violence. But who is being fed; Roxy, or her soon-to-be ex-husband?Read the book and take the quiz below to receive the benefits listed in the quiz description. Screenshot your scores of at least 90% accuracy, and send them to socialmediumpublications@gmail.com with the subject line "He Killed Me First Quiz"Thanks for stopping by, happy readinghttps://www.goodreads.com/quizzes/113...
author: Anetta Tequila
